narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Essentials of Recovery De is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Wilmington, DE. From 2024-02 through 2024-10, this provider received $172K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 342 beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 96% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: H0015 (H0015). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
